entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
